entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Kouchibouguac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 03:00 AM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
